1059:4: kasya pañcagatike ājavaṃjavībhāvena janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt?
1059:5: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā - anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāraḥ iti |
1059:6: avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ tṛṣṇāgaṇḍurabaddhānāṃ saṃsaratāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyata iti |
1059:17: yadi hi saṃsāro nāma kaścit syāt,
1059:21: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā - anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti |
1059:24: saṃsāra eva nāstīti nanu spaṣṭamādeśayāmāsa bhagavān |
1059:29: atredaṃ vicāryate - yadi pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca saṃsārasya niṣiddhaṃ bhagavatā,
1059:30: kathaṃ punaridamāha - tasmāttarhi saṃsārakṣayāya pratipatsyāmaha ityevaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam, iti? ucyate |
1059:33: teṣāṃ tu lokottaramārgajñānāgninā dagdhāśeṣakleśavāsanāmūlaniḥśeṣapādapānāṃ bhavatyeva antaḥ iti vijñeyam ||
1059:37: yathā bījasya dṛṣṭo'nto na cādistasya vidyate |
1059:39: sa ca antopadeśo laukika eva vyavahāre sthitvā saṃsāracārakāvabaddhānāmutsāhanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ deśito laukikajñānāpekṣayā |
1059:43: atrāha - yadyevaṃ laukikajñānāpekṣayā antavad ādirapi kiṃ nocyate? ucyate |
1059:44: ahetukadoṣaprasaṅgāt laukikajñānāpekṣayāpi saṃsārasyāderabhāva ityubhayathāpyāderabhāva eveti vijñeyam ||1||
1059:45: atrāha - yadyāpi avarāgre na staḥ saṃsārasya,
1059:53: naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet |
1059:62: tataśca saṃjñāmātraka meva viparyāsaparavaśamānasānāṃ saṃsāraḥ ādimadhyāvasānavirahitatvādākāśavadalātacakrādivaditi bhāvaḥ |
1059:65: ata eva saṃsārābhāvājjātijarāmaraṇādīnāṃ pūrvāparasahakramā api naiva santītyāha -
1059:74: jarāmaraṇarahitasya bhāvasya jātau parikalpyamānāyāmanyatra amṛtasyaiva devadattasya prathamamiha jātiḥ parikalpyamānā syāt |
1059:79: atha syāt - āmrādīnāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ vināpi jarāmaraṇasaṃbandhāt prathamameva utpādo dṛṣṭaḥ,
1059:83: āmrādīnāmapi hi svabījanirodhe samutpadyamānatvāt nānyatrāvinaṣṭānāmutpāda iti samametat pūrveṇa ||
1059:88: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
1059:102: yatha ukkhitte loḍhammi ukkheve atthi kāraṇaṃ |
1059:103: ṣaḍane kāraṇaṃ ṇatthi aṇṇaṃ ukkhevakāraṇā || iti |
1059:107: jātihetukatvāccāsyodgamanameva vināśasya heturiti kṛtvā eṣāpi gāthā sunītā bhavati -
1059:109: sa bhāva eva dhammāṇaṃ yaṃ vibhonti samuggatā ||
1059:118: na caivaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ yajjāyamāna eva mriyate iti |
1059:121: na hi sahabhūtayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayoranyonyahetukatā dṛṣṭeti na yuktametat ||5||
1059:124: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim ||6||
1059:125: yasyāṃ jātau yatra jarāmaraṇe ete pūrvāparasahakramāḥ na santi,
1059:130: evamavidyamāneṣu jātyādiṣu tāṃ jātibhavidyamānāṃ bālāḥ kiṃ prapañcayanti tacca jarāmaraṇaṃ yanna saṃvidyate?
1059:134: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca |
1059:135: vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana ||7||
1059:136: pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam |
1059:138: tatra yadi pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ paścātkāryaṃ syāt,
1059:145: na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya vyākhyānena kāryakāraṇādikaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam,
1059:147: teṣāmapi pūrvā koṭirna vidyata iti yojyam ||
1059:148: ata eva āryaratnameghasūtre āryasarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇā mahābodhisattvena bhagavān stutaḥ -
1059:159: stāṃśca ca pabhāṣati no ca kṣapeti |
